name: nexocode
tagline: We ship custom software made by real experts
description:
Nexocode is a team of creative experts based in Poland. We design and produce modern and advanced IT systems.
We specialize in:
systems integration
intensive data processing
machine learning
To ensure our clients have full flexibility and control over the software development process we apply the agile approach for project managing.
We got the biggest achievements in:
Travel
Logistics and Spedition
Healthcare
Our engineers are active in professional communities by contributing either to open source projects or speaking at the events
